entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublishAot should enable single file safety analyzer #82503
    8.0.0
  • Fix the natvis to display better visualization for GenTree nodes #82497
  • Mono runtime fails to build for win-arm64 (and thus cross-compilers) #82496
  • Mono runtime fails to build cross-compilers for x86/x64 on arm/arm64 #82495
  • System.Media.SoundPlayer doesn't play specific encoding Lavf58.29.100 #82494
  • Stop using select in the Mono debugger agent #82493
    8.0.0
  • Stop using select in the Mono profiler #82492
    8.0.0
  • CMake caching pain with MSVC update #82490
  • [Analyzer] Suggest more optimal SIMD patterns where applicable #82488
  • [Analyzer] Upgrade from platform specific to cross platform intrinsics #82486
    8.0.0
  • Add possibility to add configuration files from anywhere #82485
  • Identity: Adding user to role gives an Invalid Username error (UserManager.cs). #82483
  • [wasm] Blazor/AOT crashing with preview1 - `Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/aot-runtime.c:2443` #82481
  • NativeAOT doesn't generate IL3000 and IL3001 - access to Assembly.Location property #82475
    8.0.0
  • Unroll SequenceEqual for u8 literals #82474
    Future
  • .NET 7 WebAssembly - Algorithm 'Aes' is not supported on this platform. #82472
    Future
  • builds breaking because `CSharpMarkAssembliesWithNeutralResourcesLanguageAnalyzer` fails with `Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'type')` #82467
  • [Feature Request]: Better ILogger sampling and filtering #82465
    Future
  • Support sites with invalid IDN in SslStream #82464
    8.0.0
  • get some docker images with libmsquic from main that contains OpenSSL 3 -- @wfurt #82463
  • Add source gen support for `unspeakable types` #82457
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Configuration section Value discrepancy #82489
    Future
  • Deduplication of symbols by using dedup/linkonce features #80419
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT MissingMetadataException links to .NET Native troubleshooter that recommends using RD.xml. #82498
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks in .NET 8 does not target .NET 8 #82241
    8.0.0
  • DateTime year is wrong when using Japanese calendar in Windows. #82487
  • JIT: hoisting float var profitability mis-categorizes SIMD types #82351
    8.0.0
  • [Fuzzlyn] Jump into the middle of handler region #81675
    8.0.0
  • ReplaceLineEndings is slower than Replace("\r\n") #82491
  • Possible performance regression when accessing field of static generic type #82484
  • Fallback host rid is broken on non-portable builds #81654
    8.0.0
  • Error NETSDK1045 The current .NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 8.0. Either target .NET 7.0 or lower #82280

PullRequests

Created

  • Use asynchronous lock in Parallel.ForEachAsync with synchronous enumerable #82501
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessarion _version++ from a few places #82500
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • Return singleton enumerators from IEnumerable.GetEnumerator for empty collections #82499
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Fixed name of frozen string dictionary files #82482
    community-contribution
  • [browser] Fixed the 3rd argument for TypedArray.fill() #82480
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [jiterp] Adjust jiterpreter thresholds to exercise it more on CI #82476
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • EventPipe env var to disable stack collection #82470
    EventPipe, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary `unsafe` modifier from `LibraryImport` methods #82462
    community-contribution
  • update Ubuntu 22 Helix images #82460
  • Call base.DisposeAsync on DerivedFileStreamStrategy #82459
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Replace `SafeLocalAllocHandle` in `System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter` #82456
    community-contribution

Merged

  • Refactor Logging.Console configure options #82254
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [mono][aot] Remove unused skip flag in the dedup #82471
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix unbalanced brackets in clrjit natvis GenTree output #82332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix loop hoisting float var profitability calculation #82352
  • Fix issues with EH in unexecuted loops #82329
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Share test cases for NativeAOT #82216
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Add `WasiAppBuilder` task #82126
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Revert changes in libunwind vendor directory #82473
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup on tvOS device + arm64 simulators #82403
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [jiterp] Inline some performance-sensitive operations into traces #82469
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [LoongArch64] redesign the compare and condition-branch. #82426
    community-contribution
  • corehost: derive fallback rid from output rid. #82163
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Remove invalid internal attribute which causes warnings #82398
    test-enhancement, linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix DBI loading problem on Linux #82461
  • Add pool provider template reference #82452
  • Update Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native from 16.9.0-beta1.21055.5 to 16.11.23-beta1.23063.1 #82188
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Format host tracing for deps parsing for easier reading #82333
    area-Host

Updated

  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Refactor common variables used for the "send runtime tests to helix" steps into a shared template that all of our pipelines that run runtime tests can use. #81926
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Lift remaining cmov restrictions by introducing GT_SELECTCC #82235
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace some use of string.CompareOrdinal with string == #82438
  • Store Parallel.ForEachAsync exceptions from cancellation callbacks #82434
  • Fix SafeHandle debug-only _ctorStackTrace for mono #82376
  • Add support for dumping native stacks with cdb #82189
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasi: add workload packs, templates, and Wasi.Build.Tests #81849
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • WIP: Refactor `Interop.LocalAlloc` #82450
    community-contribution
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.C.ConfigurationManager #82259
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [wasi+browser] bundle timezones into .wasm #82250
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • Issue correct Enable/Disable commands for EventSources with EventPipe #81867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Cache and reuse some allocations during Linq.Expression evaluation. #82443
  • [wasm] Make `WasmMainJSPath` optional #81484
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Always transform `AND(X, CNS(-1))` to `X` #82276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add new System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations features #82311
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Wasi icu load test #82444
  • [NativeAOT] Add System.Globalization.Native builds for iOS-like platforms #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • provide custom marshaller for USER_INFO_1 #82350
    community-contribution
  • Deduplicate platform lists in BuildIntegration #82395
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #82146
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update ILLink wording #82050
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [workload] Upstream net7 manifest json and targets #82267
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2120652 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [eventpipe] Perform endian aware serialization of structs and arrays above FireETW layer #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert all usages of target_link_libraries to use PUBLIC/PRIVATE specifiers #81924
    area-Infrastructure
  • Replace RichNav with Code Index #82088
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Mono] Add initial arm64 hardware intrinsics support for mini JIT #82420
  • let user know working directory will be used as content root path by default #82445
    community-contribution
  • Let GenTreeCopyOrReload handle scenarios when FEATURE_MULTIREG_RET is disabled #82451
  • [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #82429
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Enable constant folding in Tier0 #82412
  • [HTTP/3] Attempt at using newer image to allow H/3 Windows stress #82226
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix rva[cns] folding #81854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Append leftovers of FromBase64Transform's input buffer to the transform buffer #82148
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][jit] Refactor SIMD type detection. #82419
  • [release/7.0] System.Console: allow terminfo files to be larger than 4KiB. #82082
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 7.0.5
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE to ELF dumps #82449
  • Use optimistic concurrency when configuring JsonTypeInfo metadata. #82198
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] System.Console: allow terminfo files to be larger than 4KiB. #82433
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Console.Unix: fix escape sequence for setting title on 'screen' TERM. #82432
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 7.0.5
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #81187
    area-Host
  • [Mono]: Add support for lazy runtime init in native-to-managed wrapper, similar to NativeAOT library build. #82253
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Annotation changes only (part 2) #82388
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Microsoft.NET.ILLink package #82407
    linkable-framework, 8.0.0
  • Fix passing Mac Catalyst -target flag to .mm builds #82292
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Proposed host runtime delegate for loading an assembly #82138
    area-Host
  • [wasm] Remove the EnumCalendarInfo workaround from the pinvoke table … #82362
  • Fixing a bug that causes us to mistakenly demote a gen2 region to gen0 #82413
  • Refactoring store liveness update #80539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Avoid allocations when adding existing items to the blob heap. #81059
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [JIT] On importing a CEE_INITOBJ for a simd, construct a VecCon(0) #81982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add RID for Ubuntu 23.04 #82284
    area-Meta
  • update msquic #81742
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Separate the generation of PerfMap and JitDump files #82142
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix the multicore performance of mapping from an instruction pointer to a MethodDesc #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasi] Don't provision wasmtime on CI #82454
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
